qa-2026-02-12-e2e-full-run-remaining-fai.title: Full Chromium E2E run still not green on compose-lite
qa-2026-02-12-e2e-full-run-remaining-fai.details: Latest full run on 2026-02-12: 3 failed, 29 passed, 4 skipped. Remaining failing specs: `tests/a11y.spec.ts` (dashboard), `tests/llm-config.spec.ts`, `tests/stress.spec.ts`.

qa-2026-02-12-a11y-dashboard-networkidle.title: a11y dashboard test times out on networkidle wait
qa-2026-02-12-a11y-dashboard-networkidle.details: `tests/a11y.spec.ts` fails on `page.waitForLoadState('networkidle')` after dashboard heading assertion; timeout reproduces on retry.

qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-networkidle-tim.title: LLM config persistence test times out after reload
qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-networkidle-tim.details: `tests/llm-config.spec.ts` fails on reload + `waitForLoadState('networkidle')` when validating provider persistence; timeout reproduces on retry.

qa-2026-02-12-stress-concurrent-reload-f.title: Stress test uses parallel reload pattern that fails nondeterministically
qa-2026-02-12-stress-concurrent-reload-f.details: `tests/stress.spec.ts` schedules multiple `page.reload({ waitUntil: 'networkidle' })` calls in parallel, causing timeout or `net::ERR_ABORTED`/detached frame on retry.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.title: Auth fixture-state tests are skipped in compose-backed runs
qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.details: `auth-lockout`, `auth-rate-limit`, and `auth-password` skip when `ANANTA_E2E_USE_EXISTING=1` because they rely on sqlite fixture mutation helpers not valid for compose postgres setup.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.title: Compose-lite postgres logs report missing locale binary
qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.details: Postgres init logs include `sh: locale: not found` and `no usable system locales were found`; service remains healthy.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Hub/worker logs warn about host kernel setting `vm.overcommit_memory=0`; currently non-blocking for E2E.
